Uses of Class
edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.hmmalign.AlHandler

  • Packages that use AlHandler 
    Package Description
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.hmmalign
    This package contains implementations of IBM model I for statistical machine translation as well as an HMM model including extensions for handling fertility, part of speech tag information, and NULL correspondences.

    • Uses of AlHandler in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.hmmalign

      Subclasses of AlHandler in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.hmmalign 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlHandlerHMM1
      This serves to handle the alignment probabilities the basic functionality is getProb(i,j) and incCount(i,j,val);

      This serves to handle the alignment probabilities the basic functionality is getProb(i,j) and incCount(i,j,val);

      This serves to handle the alignment probabilities the basic functionality is getProb(i,j) and incCount(i,j,val);

      This serves to handle the alignment probabilities.

      This serves to handle the alignment probabilities this is trigram HMM

      class  CHandler
